title: Forgot Mail Address
body:
Hi, Riot,

My small brother forgot the mail which he used to create his lol account. Is there any way he can receive a mail from you on another address so he can find out on which mail he made his account?

He can login and play without using his email, but he wants to change his password and he can't because he forgot his email address.

Is there any way to recover his email or is there another way to change his password?

Thank you!

replies.body:
To protect the security of an account we don't typically share that information.
There _might _ be a workaround, but I can't make a promise.

Have your bother send in a [Player Support request](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and message me with your case number; I'll be happy to take a look.
